ai-atk-s0517a12:202_3: and because I’ve spoken of six elements.
ai-atk-s0517a12:202_4: and men kept on the neck of the sense fields.
ai-atk-s0517a12:202_5: They covets of choices that lead to their debate, attachment, and ignorance. When they’re eliminated, and obscure them on the side of breaking up and destruction. All these things are empty of these things.
ai-atk-s0517a12:202_6: ducing each other with emptiness, beauty, happiness, fame, and sovereignty, all of them.
ai-atk-s0517a12:204_0: You communicate only in empty mansion of emptiness.
ai-atk-s0517a12:205_1: Everyone is permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will be permanent.
ai-atk-s0517a12:205_2: One whose path is permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will always be permanent.
ai-atk-s0517a12:205_3: So impermanent is empty of happiness.
ai-atk-s0517a12:205_5: one who is diligent and discerning,
ai-atk-s0517a12:205_6: none of these seven things, all conditioned things, and dependently originated.
ai-atk-s0517a12:205_7: Unconditions are the conditioned phenomena, conditioned by choices, and mind.
ai-atk-s0517a12:206_0: All the true Teachings of the Monastic Law
ai-atk-s0517a12:207_0: The Self of empty huts is finished.
ai-atk-s0517a12:208_0: The Rememberation of gold is finished.
ai-atk-s0517a12:209_0: The Middle Discourses is completed by those who are never determined.
